item.title: Hardware Infrastructure, Part 2
item.description: In part 2 of our hardware infrastructure episode, Corey, Dee and Jessie talk to DAppNode founder, Edu Antu√±a and Pol Lanski with DAppNode business and ecosystem development about how they got their start and what they envision for the future.

item.title: Hardware Infrastructure, Part 1
item.description: In this episode, Corey, Dee and Jessie talk to Rick Dudley , President of Vulcanize & TrueBlocks Founder, TJ Rush, about blockchain hardware.
